entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of showers near midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
